name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Rivera's Revenge
description:
Turn on your bike light to explore the secret cave of Sierra Rivera’s lost trail in this free DLC.

Collect the fire elemental customization set by playing through the brand-new challenges.

Features:
- One trail with exciting challenges and two resting places awaits you
- Gear up with new outfits, backpacks and paint job from the fire elemental set
- Experience the beauty of Sierra Rivera on the all-new trail
- Make a name for yourself on the leaderboard

Saddle up and face Rivera’s Revenge in the Lonely Mountains.
